decisions.choice: {"type":"Freemium","description":"Offer 5 free tokens to users, with option to sign up for 50 more t

artifacts.content:
{
  "mvp_features": [
    "Landing page with prompt window",
    "Builder page with 5 free tokens",
    "AI-powered build process",
    "Token system with signup prompt",
    "Login and signup pages",
    "Basic file explorer and editor",
    "AI chat with message history"
  ],
  "roadmap": [
    {
      "phase": "MVP",
      "features": [
        "Landing page with prompt window",
        "Builder page with 5 free tokens",
        "AI-powered build process",
        "Token system with signup prompt",
        "Login and signup pages"
      ],
      "timeline": "6 weeks"
    },
    {
      "phase": "Post-MVP",
      "features": [
        "Advanced file explorer and editor",
        "AI chat with improved message history",
        "Collaboration features",
        "Integration with third-party services"
      ],
      "timeline": "12 weeks"
    }
  ],
  "technical_requirements": {
    "frontend": "Next.js 14, React 18, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS",
    "backend": "API integration with /api/guest/build and /api/guest/build?sessionId=xxx",
    "storage": "localStorage for token and prompt storage"
  },
  "success_criteria": [
    "Landing page loads with prompt window as main focus",
    "Login/Signup buttons are on RIGHT side of header",
    "Start Building stores prompt and redirects to /builder",
    "Builder shows 5 tokens initially",
    "Builder layout: file explorer | editor+preview | AI chat",
    "Build progress shows in editor area",
    "Messages use tokens (decrement counter)",
    "Token = 0 triggers signup prompt",
    "Login/Signup pages work with proper redirects"
  ]
}
